name: Real Golf 3D Free - World Professional Sports Game
name_original: Real Golf 3D Free - World Professional Sports Game
description:
*** Gentleman! Lets play golf game on mobile, accept challenge of become a super star of different golf courses ***


Real Golf 3D is one of the top free golf simulator game for iOS! It is the game for golfers with stunning 3D golf courses & scenes. It is easy to play, but the real challenge is to become master in it. You’ll be totally addicted to the numerous game plays; just power-up and shoot. Golf Simulation – swing, drive, chip and putt using different golf shots from different lies on the tee, fairway, rough, bunkers and greens in this realistic 3d golf simulation. It is the greatest golf game you’ll ever play, featuring realistic graphics, golfing techniques mastered by the pros, and a simulation powered by real physics-based gameplay.
How to Play:
• Drag Screen Right/Left angle to position ball towards the flag
• To power up click & hold the HIT button; & release to play shot
• Before hitting perfect shot, make sure that wind direction & distance is viewed
• Tilt the device in to & fro motion to control ball's flight in the air
Scoring
Scores will be added if the ball stops on the Hole circles
• Circle 1: 500pts
• Circle 2: 1000pts
• Circle 3: 2000pts
• Circle 4: 3000pts
• Hole: 5000pts
Unlocking New Screen
Achieve total score of 60000pts to unlock next scene
Game Features:
- FREE to PLAY!
- Drop-in bonuses
- Drop-in time bonuses
- Realistic physics and ball movement
- User friendly navigation
- The lush 3D visuals are great on the eyes
